query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		staticinboxview {
			_id,
			assets,
			assigned_to_group_ids,
			assigned_to_user_ids,
			built_in,
			created_at,
			custom_fields,
			custom_inbox_ids,
			filters,
			hackathons,
			id,
			key,
			name,
			position,
			pre_submission_states,
			reporter_ids,
			severities,
			sort_direction,
			sort_type,
			substates,
			text_query,
			updated_at,
			visible,
		}
	}
